creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel huipil; central section has red ground with discrete yellow and blue striping; side panels are red and white warp stripes with alternating red and white? weft stripes creating a subtle checkered effect; round cut neckline.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
